segment.source: Create a New Controlled GPO
segment.target: Create a New Controlled GPO

segment.source: Create a New Controlled GPO
segment.target: Create a New Controlled GPO

segment.source: Create a New Controlled GPO
segment.target: Create a New Controlled GPO

segment.source: New Group Policy Objects (GPOs) created through the Change Control folder will automatically be controlled, enabling you to manage them.
segment.target: New Group Policy Objects (GPOs) created through the Change Control folder will automatically be controlled, enabling you to manage them.

segment.source: A user account with the Approver or AGPM Administrator (Full Control) role or necessary permissions in Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM) is required to complete this procedure.
segment.target: A user account with the Approver or AGPM Administrator (Full Control) role or necessary permissions in Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM) is required to complete this procedure.

segment.source: Review the details in "Additional considerations" in this topic.
segment.target: Review the details in "Additional considerations" in this topic.

segment.source: To create a new GPO with change control managed through AGPM
segment.target: To create a new GPO with change control managed through AGPM

segment.source: In the Group Policy Management Console tree, click Change Control in the forest and domain in which you want to manage GPOs.
segment.target: In the Group Policy Management Console tree, click Change Control in the forest and domain in which you want to manage GPOs.

segment.source: Right-click Change Control, and then click New Controlled GPO.
segment.target: Right-click Change Control, and then click New Controlled GPO.

segment.source: In the New Controlled GPO dialog box:
segment.target: In the New Controlled GPO dialog box:

segment.source: Type a name for the new GPO.
segment.target: Type a name for the new GPO.

segment.source: Optional: Type a comment for the new GPO to be displayed in the History for the GPO.
segment.target: Optional: Type a comment for the new GPO to be displayed in the History for the GPO.

segment.source: To immediately deploy the new GPO to the production environment, click Create live.
segment.target: To immediately deploy the new GPO to the production environment, click Create live.

segment.source: To create the new GPO offline without immediately deploying it, click Create offline.
segment.target: To create the new GPO offline without immediately deploying it, click Create offline.

segment.source: Select the GPO template to use as a starting point for the new GPO.
segment.target: Select the GPO template to use as a starting point for the new GPO.

segment.source: Click OK.
segment.target: Click OK.

segment.source: When the Progress window indicates that overall progress is complete, click Close.
segment.target: When the Progress window indicates that overall progress is complete, click Close.

segment.source: The new GPO is displayed in the list of GPOs on the Controlled tab.
segment.target: The new GPO is displayed in the list of GPOs on the Controlled tab.

segment.source: Additional considerations
segment.target: Additional considerations

segment.source: By default, you must be an Approver or an AGPM Administrator (Full Control) to perform this procedure.
segment.target: By default, you must be an Approver or an AGPM Administrator (Full Control) to perform this procedure.

segment.source: Specifically, you must have List Contents and Create GPO permissions for the domain.
segment.target: Specifically, you must have List Contents and Create GPO permissions for the domain.

segment.source: Additional references
segment.target: Additional references

segment.source: Creating, Controlling, or Importing a GPO
segment.target: Creating, Controlling, or Importing a GPO
